import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, Route } from "react-router-dom" import Home from './pages/Home' import About from './pages/About' import Header from './component/Header' export default class App extends Component { // 1. 点击导航连接引起路径变化 // 2. 路径的变化被前端路由器监测到，进行匹配组件，从而展示 render() { return (

React Router Demo

{/* 原生html中靠 a 标签跳转不同的页面 */} {/* About Home */} {/* 在React中靠路由链接实现切换组件 -- 编写路由链接 导航区*/} About Home
{/* 展示区写Route标签进行路径匹配 */}
) } }
